alterEgo.name: Peter Parker
alterEgo.effectText: Scientist - Resource: Generate a mental resource. (Limit once per round.)
alterEgo.flavorText: Right now, I'd trade the whole Spider-Man bit for a rocking chair a good book.

hero.name: Spider-Man
hero.effectText: Spider-Sense - Interrupt: When you villain initiates an attack against you, draw 1 card.

alterEgo.name: Carol Danvers
alterEgo.effectText: Commander - Action: Choose a player to draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)
alterEgo.flavorText: It's my job to protect the Earch and everyone on it.

hero.name: Captain Marvel
hero.effectText: Rechannel - Action: Spend an energy resource and heal 1 damage from Captain Marvel -> draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)
